entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Pincourt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sainte-Anne-de-Bellevue 01:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

Humidity: 65 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
